Logan & Lincoln to Benjamin Briggs, 24 December 18421 Yours of the 21stnotifying us of your levy onHall’s land is received–2Did we order that
               execution? Our recollection is that we did not– MrHall was to give us an order to draw
               some rent coming to him in this town, and we were to stay the execution– He has not
               sent us the order yet,– Tell him to send us the
               order immediately, & dismiss the levy–3
